website_summaries.verdict: Rabbits will love this two-story hutch almost as much as you. Lockable doors give you security, while a decorative flower box add style.
pros: Roof covered with asphalt keeps pets dry
Three doors can be locked for security
Constructed from cedar and treated with water-based paint
Relatively easy to set up, even though it has decorative pieces
cons: May leak if rabbit urinates where the tray meets the wood

customer_reviews.title: This hutch is adorable. We have a lion/lop bunny who enjoys the ...
customer_reviews.text: This hutch is adorable. We have a lion/lop bunny who enjoys the space. We keep it indoors. I saw some reviews that urine can leak out. I have noticed that if my bunny pees where the tray meets the wood it'll leak but that's the only spot. My bunny also likes to chew on the wood here and there so we bought some wood toys for him to chew instead. We change out the bedding twice a week and don't have a lot of problems with excess urine so maybe that's the difference with the other folks. So far this is a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great bunny house, after a few alterations!
customer_reviews.text: This bunny house is super cute! I did have issues putting it together though. The flower box was glued together wrong and I had to take it apart and reapply the wood glue. I also had to cut the ramp down and install a landing. It was a tight fit for my bunnies. I did also add wheels to the bottom to make it easier to move around my room when cleaning. Overall, I’m glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, super cute and kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love this hutch. I researched before I purchased. The quality for the price is hard to find. Easy to assemble even with the instructions lacking. I found a YouTube video. It’s very sturdy. Easy for my 9 year old to take care of her rabbits with little help. Easy for her to removd tray to clean. Most hutch’s seemed difficult for children to get the rabbits from much less feed and clean easily. I’d definitely order again. Mine Is outdoors yet it is covered. Super happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and spacious!
customer_reviews.text: Went together super easily. Looks cute, and my bunny hasn't chewed the wood at all (have been using it for approx 1 month). I feel good about the amount of room he has inside the cage. The only thing I would change is a full slide out tray, rather than a partial tray. But, as long as your bunny isn't extra messy it shouldn't be a problem. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Just Us

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are dumb. You really need to study the look of ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are dumb. You really need to study the look of the pic there to get things together. Imagine 5 steps in the instructions lol . We got it together by common sense. Also, the little flower holder was actually messed up. Holes were not aligned! But it's perfect!!! Oh and chipped here and there, but whatever, the house is adorable!! Solid too!! Indoor use for our bunnies.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Never get a bunny
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves the cage; however, she loves to eat it. Now I feel it’s money down the drain. We wanted to give her more than the cage at the pet store. She gets out of the cage and has time to hop around the house to get energy out. Although, still ate majority of the ladder. The worse part is she pees right on the bottom half where the pan comes out so it leaks in the floor. I know it’s not the cages fault but which the bottom was a complete pan. I only included some pics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional amount of space; watch for shipping damage
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought one for her Holland Lop and he loves it. Had to get one for my Satin b/c he's in a smaller hutch that doesn't give him the room he needs. This will be PERFECT for him. On my daughter's unit, there was some cosmetic (non-major structural) damage (as if someone had stood on the box). I'll update if mine doesn't have any issues
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Ward

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey and there needs to be a better option for the poot pan.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my rabbit. The instructions were kind of a mess. I had to YouTube for help. It is very sturdy and a good quality. The pan is nice but there's no rack for his poots to go on. He seems to prefer the corner and the wood is ruined there. I got him a litter box to go in and that has seemed to help. He loves the two stories and his little private room he sleeps in.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was straight forward - I used wood glue to add a little more strength. All the parts fit together well and all hardware was included. Honestly, I'm surprised at how sturdy this hutch is after it's all put together. The roof has the shingles already installed. Drawers slide in and out without binding. The paint is is thin and I would paint over and add a sealant if I was going to put this outside. I don't remember picking a color but mine arrived green. This will work for the bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: The rabbit hutch is cute. I use it inside. Do not think that it would hold up well outdoors. My one complaint is that there should be an option for a different type of roofing material for indoor use. The roof shingles shed and make a mess indoors. Also, the stairs are too steep. My rabbit will not go up to 2nd floor. Had a tunnel built and connected the bunny hutch to a second hutch for more space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No floor above trays
customer_reviews.text: The wood detail to this cage is great, but there is no wire floor above the trays that slide out, so the rabbits just run around in there fecies and urine, makes NO sense...so I had to build a floor on the top and bottom with a heavy duty staple gun and chicken wire..
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: RABBITS EAT WOOD
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong the product is great but if you think it’s a good idea to use for a rabbit I will say DO NOT BUY THIS FOR YOUR RABBIT. A cage made of wood is a terrible idea because all they do is chew it to pieces . Usually at 4:30 am when your trying to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, large, easy to clean rabbit hutch
customer_reviews.text: Used as an indoor cage: - pull-out top & bottom “drawers make cleaning so easy - love that the top area can be closed off with a wooden door if wanted - sturdy build - had to leave 3 screws off the peak of the roof to be able to continue to open roof & prop open with hinges - both top & bottom wire doors are difficult to get “locked” in the closed position
customer_reviews.author: Kelsier

customer_reviews.title: Cute hutch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute hutch. The instructions were not very clear but it was still pretty easy to set up. The one part that really messed me up was the divider for the top, the instructions should show where to screw the holes. I would not have this outside just cause I’m not sure how secure the fencing is. The bottom lock came broken, I’ve contacted the sellers, they are trying to come up with a solution. I have not heard back yet. I was hoping for a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked was the pee would seep through the bottom cracks, but I kept this in my house .. this would not be an issue if kept outside. Otherwise it was a wonderful and suuuper cute bunny cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, bunny loves it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, cute, and overall well made. Two floors for our bunny to have ample room to move around while in her cage. She likes to go in there and just hang out. The top of the roof opens, so it is easy to peak in. We put some plants on the little shelf and its adorable. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bunny mansion
customer_reviews.text: It was way bigger than I expected. It will be perfect for our bunny. I left off the flower box and the metal flashing on top of the roof. The inside of the roof has hinges so it seems kinda strange to screw It together unless it’s outside or you have ninja rabbits.
customer_reviews.author: DiceDice

customer_reviews.title: Let the cage air out for a few days
customer_reviews.text: The company have us the wrong screw so we had to get out own. And the paint fumes out so bad don't put your rabbit in this case for st least a few dAys.. And the detections were terrible so we had to find a video on how to make it. Now the thing that is super cool is the shelf make it really easy to clean and the huc h is so cute
customer_reviews.author: Holly Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find a bunny hutch that delivers both sturdiness and attractiveness but this product offers both. The assembly is so easy my 13-year-old put it together. It did get a little banged up in route but not a big deal. I liked it so much I went to buy another and it was no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! It was difficult to put together, there’s some rough edges, and some things didn’t line up well (taking off a star for that), but if it lasts it’ll be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hellosweetie

customer_reviews.title: its a great cage
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage its even better in person, what drew me in the most about this cage was the flower bed in the front of it which I found extremely pretty and a cute idea, it fits 2-3 rabbits well and you can even separate the bottom part from the top by just shutting close the door over the step/slide for the rabbits which I found really neat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bunny mansion!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our rabbit to keep indoors during the cold winter months. It’s very nice and my son loves it in his room!!! It is big enough to be decorated during holidays without worrying about your bunny eating the decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Parker

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: Very very easy to put together if you have any common knowledge at all about screws & putting things together. Put it together in less than an hour with a little bit of help. Has a very strong smell but I love the wood smell so it didn’t bother me. Overall I’m in love with this cage and right now my two rabbits don’t get along so it’s nice to be able to close the door to the stairs and keep them separated
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this hutch! We use our indoors and it’s too cute! Roof opens up and our bunny can stand with it closed. Easy to assemble and box arrived nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Howard

customer_reviews.title: Honestly had difficulty putting together due to lack of instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly had difficulty putting together due to lack of instructions. For almost $200 it shouldn’t be that complicated. Also, many of the holes were wider than the screw therefore, had to make new ones to secure. Not sure if it’s worth it. On a positive note, the product does match the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rabbit Hutch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Rabbit Hutch. Took a bit of figuring out to build it but it wasnt impossible. I did it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Rikki Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Nice rabbit hutch
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and nice looking. The only negative is the sides aren’t tall enough so bedding and poo goes everywhere. You will need to attach a 2-3 inch backing around the caged area.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, my son and I had it together in about 45 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for more than one bunny.
customer_reviews.text: My bunnies started chewing on the ramp immediately after entering. They managed to remove it from the wooden platform but I reattached with a slightly larger screw than was supplied and is holding just fine now
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B

customer_reviews.title: Nice rabbit house.
customer_reviews.text: Houses one rabbit really well and is easy to build. Recommend painting it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: My bunny LOVES her house!
customer_reviews.text: Duchess LOVES her house!! She has the whole apartment to run around in, but still hangs out in the house all the time. It’s easy to clean, and can fit a litter box upstairs if you leave the upstairs wooden piece out. Also don’t seal the roof closed, that way you can take the litter box in and out and also give your bunny pets :) I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Small dog condo.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my micro chickens but they ended up being roosters so I couldn’t keep them. I decided to put it together and use it for my 3 small dogs (4lb, 6lb and 10lb. I am so happy with my new dog condo! Littles in the top and big guy on bottom. Love it! Inside of course.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Not safe for small bunnies. The ladder is too narrow. Good buy for larger rabbits.
customer_reviews.author: Maer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pieces to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Directions weren’t that easy to follow. Beautiful house once it’s all together. Had a large chip in one side panel but everything else was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great rabbit house!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this cute rabbit house! The smell some have commented on smelled like fresh cut wood to me; not offensive at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Needed new paint
customer_reviews.text: The paint job was horrible so I repainted it with pet safe paint from Benjamin Moore. The wood is cheap and not durable. Not sure how long it'll last but I'm hoping for the best since I put some extra love into it. The directions are easy to understand and the house is easy to put together. Not all the pieces fit perfectly but it's doable
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much! However, Petsfit employees need to put more care towards how well they do their jobs. I had to remove the hinges for the roof, and replace them. Who ever had done it originally had just slapped them on wherever, so it did not fit right at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Great rabbit hutch! Easy to assemble. Bunny loves it - taking a little bit of time to figure out the ladder but I'm sure it will come along. So far easily goes up, not so sure about going down. Pull out drawers are a little stiff. It houses one blue Holland lop, tiny bunny so hutch seems like the perfect size. I did a lot of research before purchasing and so far very happy with choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality of this bunny cottage. Each floor slides out for cleaning and the roof opens for cleaning and visiting. The size is great. It is smaller in width than our one story hutch but has nore room. We are keeping it inside and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Carl and Lisa Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect In House Bunny Hutch
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome indoor hutch for our new Polish bunny. A smaller breed, so little Pierogi has a ton of room to run and play. Let's just say she is spoiled!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit loves it and so do we!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but pretty heavy. This is a well thought out design. We're very pleased with the construction and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mikko

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE....does have a strong smell when first out of the box, but still looks just as pictured and was easy enough to put together. Plenty of room for the bunnies especially with the exercise-pen
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor rabbit cage
customer_reviews.text: This was worth every penny. Very well constructed, but directions were terrible.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Wrong trim sent
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice hut. They sent us the wrong roofing trim so that makes it hard to assemble.. looks a little different without it.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Allen

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: One star for being cute. It’s easy to put together, but it’s definitely not a good outdoor option. Only use this inside!
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Clodfelter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and very cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Looked just like the picture, very cute little house. I use it for my cats, they love hanging out in there. It was simple to put together for it done in 20 min with one person.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is outstanding. I had to put it together but was very easy to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: and so far it is very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Moki loves her new home, and so far it is very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Toth

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this rabbit run. Beautiful and heavy duty. My lion head loves it.
customer_reviews.author: abigeil

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute easy to build hard to clean looks just like picture
customer_reviews.author: Nalleli

customer_reviews.title: Great product. 1 board came cracked amd broken
customer_reviews.text: Great product. 1 board came cracked amd broken, i glued it together. Directions could be more visual on the latter and playbord, and the roof could be installed last to give better access to side pot building.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions are off QUITE a bit when referencing the photo. It's actually 30 inches deep, not 24. Including the flower box it's about 44 inches wide, not 29. The height is pretty close at 46 inches. It's cute and was easy to assemble, however 4 pieces to ours were busted at the joints when we took the pieces out and required a significant amount of wood glue, clamps and reinforcing nails and screws. Pretty over priced when you consider that. I wouldn't buy it again, nor would I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: A pain to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a five star but some pieces were missing which assembling this harder then it needed to be .-.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Samuel Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Jet’s home
customer_reviews.text: Adorable house! The window box is a little crooked. Overall very happy with it. It took about 2 hrs to assemble with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My bunny LOVES it! The directions were simple enough to follow and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute but my Bunny doesn’t know how to get up the ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once I finally received it which I have to call ...
customer_reviews.text: Once I finally received it which I have to call amazon a bunch of times about it, it works out well for our rabbit
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia smith

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and super easy to put together even though it looks like a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as the picture...not all things I buy online are...thank you...my bunny loves his new house 😀❤
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, high quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Looks just like the photo. Heavy and sturdy. Very happy with this purchase and how fast it delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and spacious, but how do you get the urine smell out of the wood? We use a power washer with soap and it still reaks. This cage is smelling up my whole house!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Newgard

product_meta.title: Petsfit 42.5 x 30 x 46 inches Bunny Cages,Outdoor Rabbit Hutch
product_meta.description:
Storefront Link: www.amazon.com/shops/petsfit

Basic information:

Wood: natural cedar

Paint: water-based paint

Outer dimension:31.5"L x 26"W x 46"H

NOTE: KEEP PETS FROM SWALLOWING THE COMPONENT

Designs and Functions:

1. Treated with WATER-BASED paint which is safer for your pet.

2. Big entrance allows bunny or small dog run in and out.

3. Ideal condo for pet.

4. Easy to set up with just a few steps.

Warranty:

1. Petsfit adhere to Amazon Return Policy.

2. Within 30 days, any quality problems, we will take full responsibility.

3. Any damages happened during shipping period: contact Amazon customer service(FBA order) ;contact Petsfit(FBM order)

Attention: Please measure your pet and check the INNER DIMENSION.
feature_bullets: Made of sturdy wooden pieces and cage is made of wire that won’t be able to chew through. For the wooden frame, you could put some wood toys for bunnies to chew instead
Pull out dropping tray on each level and a sturdy ramp with a vertical door to block off the bottom
Easy to assemble with pre-drilled holes and fit well into indoor decoration and outdoor scenery; Door dimension: 9.5" x 12.5"
Hinge roof can be opened easily for cleaning and weatherproof roof prevents rain from getting in your rabbit’s hutch, which can keep inside dry
3 lockable door keeps rabbits from predators and escaping and easy to communicate with your bunnies

specifications.Manufacturer: Xiamen JXD Electronic Commerce Co., Ltd

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
